mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS SEGMENT_ID , A.NAME AS SEGMENT_NAME , A.CONTENT AS SEGMENT_CONTENT FROM SEGMENT A WHERE (#{segmentName} IS NULL OR A.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{segmentName}, '%'))

SELECT A.ID AS SEGMENT_ID , A.NAME AS SEGMENT_NAME , A.CONTENT AS SEGMENT_CONTENT , A.TOTAL_CHARGE AS SEGMENT_TOTAL_CHARGE , A.SEGMENT_PERIOD AS SEGMENT_PERIOD , A.IS_CONTRACTED AS SEGMENT_IS_CONTRACTED , A.OVERDUED AS SEGMENT_OVERDUED FROM SEGMENT A WHERE A.ID = #{segmentId}

SELECT A.ID AS customerId , A.CUSTOMER_CODE AS customerCode , A.NAME AS customerName , A.IN_CHARGE AS inCharge , A.DEPT AS dept , A.CALL_NUM AS callNum , A.STAR AS star , A.IS_DELETED AS isDeleted FROM CUSTOMER A WHERE A.SEGMENT_ID = #{segmentId} AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY A.ID DESC
